description: This header file defines the RemotePlugin class within the WPEFramework::Plugin::Rust namespace. The class implements Rust::IPlugin interface and manages remote plugin lifecycle, including initialization, deinitialization, activation, deactivation, attachment, detachment, and remote process launching. It also includes methods for handling JSON-RPC communication, message inbound processing, and callback management. The file references external classes like SocketServer and PluginHost interfaces, and contains conditional compilation blocks for version-dependent features.

classes.name: RemotePlugin
classes.description: A class that implements the Rust::IPlugin interface, managing the lifecycle and communication of a remote plugin within the WPEFramework environment.

methods.name: RemotePlugin
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the RemotePlugin with the given configuration.

methods.name: ~RemotePlugin
methods.description: Default destructor.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin with the provided shell. Returns an initialization string.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Deinitializes the plugin, cleaning up resources.

methods.name: Information
methods.description: Returns information about the plugin.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Increments the reference count for the plugin object.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Decrements the reference count.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the plugin.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the plugin.

methods.name: Attach
methods.description: Attaches a channel for communication.

methods.name: Detach
methods.description: Detaches a channel from communication.

methods.name: Close
methods.description: Closes a channel based on channel ID.

methods.name: Revoke
methods.description: Revokes a callback.

methods.name: Validate
methods.description: Validates a token, method, and parameters.

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Invokes a JSON-RPC method, with conditional overloads based on versions.

methods.name: Inbound
methods.description: Processes inbound JSON elements based on identifier.

methods.name: Inbound
methods.description: Processes inbound JSON elements based on ID.

methods.name: onRead
methods.description: Handles responses received remotely.

methods.name: LaunchRemoteProcess
methods.description: Launches a remote process given shared library, host IP, and port.

methods.name: SendTo
methods.description: Sends JSON messages to a specific channel.

methods.name: WPEFramework::PluginHost::ILocalDispatcher * Local()
methods.description: Returns a local dispatcher (placeholder implementation).
